verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The splendor of a King,
Clothed in majesty
Let all the earth rejoice,
All the earth rejoice
He wraps himself in light,
And darkness tries to hide
And trembles at his voice,
And trembles at his voice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[CHORUS 1:]
How great is our God,
sing with me
How great is our God,
and all who sing
How great, How great
Is our God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Age to age he stands
And time is in His Hands
Beginning and the End,
Beginning and the End
The Godhead, Three in one
Father, Spirit, Son
The Lion and the Lamb,
The Lion and the Lamb

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
[CHORUS 1:]
How great is our God,
sing with me
How great is our God,
and all who sing
How great, How great
Is our God

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
[CHORUS 2:]
Name above all names
You are Worthy of all praise
and My heart will sing how great
Is our God
[x2]

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
[CHORUS 1:]
How great is our God,
Sing with me
How great is our God,
and all who sing
How great, How great
Is our God

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
[CHORUS 1:]
How great is our God,
Sing with me
How great is our God,
and who sing
How great, How great
Is our God
